name: tm85
effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user’s HP.
